extendedInfo.description: Random music interval generation for voice and intonation training.Sing This suggests random notes and intervals and tracks the number you've chosen to sing. Don't like the current interval suggestion? Press the "Skip" button to get a new interval without the unwanted one counting against your practice session goal.- 2-octave interval range- Random ascending vs. descending suggestionsNOTE: this app does not generate any tones - use it alongside a keyboard, guitar or other instrument for intonation practice.Suggested use:1) Sit down at piano, launch Sing This2) Play the suggested starting note in a range comfortable for singing3) Mentally figure out the target interval note4) Without playing the note on the piano, attempt to sing the target note5) Play the target note on the piano, compare to sung note6) Repeat
